summary: This is a Bureau of Prisons Special Housing Unit record for inmate Jeffrey Epstein, covering his confinement from approximately April 4 to August 8, 2019, at the New York Metropolitan Correctional Center. It documents his daily routine, meals, and out-of-cell activities while in administrative segregation.

persons.name: Epstein, Jeffrey Edward
persons.context: The primary subject of the prison administrative record, detailing his confinement in the Special Housing Unit at the New York MCC.

persons.name: N. Reid
persons.context: Listed as the Unit Manager contact on the prison record form.

events.title: Epstein's SHU Confinement Begins
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is recorded as being in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the New York MCC, with the log starting on this date.

events.title: Epstein's SHU Confinement Log Ends
events.description: The administrative log for Jeffrey Epstein's time in the Special Housing Unit concludes on this date.

locations: Special Housing Unit Cell Number: Z04.2061/0
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was held in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the New York Metropolitan Correctional Center under registration number 76318-054.
The administrative log covers his confinement from at least April 4, 2019, to August 8, 2019.
The document is a standardized Bureau of Prisons form (BP.A0292) used to track an inmate's daily activities, meals, showers, and out-of-cell time while in segregation.
The record indicates Epstein received meals and had scheduled out-of-cell time, with entries marked for morning, day, and evening shifts.
The form includes sections for medical staff and officer-in-charge (OIC) signatures to document daily checks and observations.
